scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const dir='server/dist/public'; if(!fs.existsSync(dir)){fs.mkdirSync(dir, {recursive:true})}; fs.cpSync('client/dist', dir, {recursive:true})"
